 Watch Jessica Vosk and Kelli Barrett Sing a Song From the Upcoming Broadway Musical Beaches 
 
 
 Broadway performances start on March 27 at the Majestic Theatre.
dtliExcerpt: The show is a loving parody of terrible musicals, but it's also genuinely touching in its portrayal of two dreamers who refuse to give up on their vision.
